cards.name: Paint Roller
text: Discard any Stadium card in play. Then, draw a card.

attacks.name: Deep Sea Search
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

cards.name: Baltoy
text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's Pokémon's Abilities done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Future Spin
attacks.text: Look at the top 3 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order.

ability.name: Farewell Letter
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may discard this Pokémon and all cards attached to it (this does not count as a Knock Out). If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Lucky Helmet
text: Whenever the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Entangling Control
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon. The new Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Trash Tentacle
attacks.text: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Bullet Punch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Cotton Bed
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Data Check
attacks.text: Look through your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Lysandre
text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Eco Arm
text: Shuffle 3 Pokémon Tool cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Energy Recycler
text: Shuffle 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Forest of Giant Plants
text: Each player's Grass Pokémon can evolve during his or her first turn or the turn he or she plays those Pokémon.

cards.name: Level Ball
text: Search your deck for a Pokémon with 90 HP or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Kyurem-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Glaciate
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Icecalibur
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. The Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Flash Energy
text: This card can only be attached to Lightning Pokémon. This card provides Lightning Energy only while this card is attached to a Lightning Pokémon. The Lightning Pokémon this card is attached to has no Weakness. (If this card is attached to anything other than a Lightning Pokémon, discard this card.)

cards.name: Steven
text: Search your deck for a Supporter card and a basic Energy card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: String Shot
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

cards.name: M Sceptile-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
Prevent all effects of your opponent's Pokémon's Abilities done to this Pokémon.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Jagged Saber
attacks.text: You may attach up to 2 Grass Energy cards from your hand to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, heal all damage from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Burning Roar
attacks.text: Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Fire Energy cards, attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Combat Blaze
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Berserker Splash
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Aqua Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

cards.name: Gyarados
text: This Pokémon may have up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards attached to it.

attacks.name: Full Retaliation
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each damage counter on each of your Benched Magikarp.

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

ability.name: Aqua Effect
ability.text: Each of your Stage 1 Pokémon in play is now a Water Pokémon in addition to its existing types.

cards.name: Ampharos-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Thunder Rod
attacks.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and attach as many Lightning Energy cards you find there as you like to this Pokémon. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Sparkling Tail
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Electric Mischief
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into his or her deck.

ability.name: Scoundrel Ring

text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
